p.k: In this chapter, Claudio and his team venture into Kenya to reach the villa inhabited by the Maasai tribe. Before heading to Kenya from Tanzania, Claudio and the team share with the common people, they eat their food, try their beer made from banana, among other things. Then Claudio its way to the adventure of meeting once again with his friends Maasai. Once you arrive, you are greeted warmly by one of the Maasai women, who reminded Claudio of his previous coming. The team is invited to visit their homes, how they live, what they eat and Claudio is tested by a Masai when he makes an awkward question...
